Package com.mimecast.robin.config

Class DovecotConfig

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.config.ConfigFoundation
com.mimecast.robin.config.BasicConfig
com.mimecast.robin.config.DovecotConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DovecotConfig extends BasicConfig
Typed Dovecot-specific configuration extending BasicConfig.

Provides typed accessors for authentication backend (socket or SQL) and mailbox delivery backend. The delivery backend is automatically selected based on which backend has `enabled: true`. LMTP takes precedence if both are enabled. Shared delivery options and backend-specific configuration are grouped logically under saveLda and saveLmtp objects.

See Also:

    • getInlineSaveMaxAttempts

      public long getInlineSaveMaxAttempts()
      Gets maximum number of inline save attempts before giving up.

      Applies to both LDA and LMTP backends.

      Returns:
      Maximum number of attempts (default: 2).

    • getInlineSaveRetryDelay

      public long getInlineSaveRetryDelay()
      Gets delay (in seconds) between inline save retry attempts.

      Applies to both LDA and LMTP backends.

      Returns:
      Delay in seconds (default: 3).

    • getFailureBehaviour

      public String getFailureBehaviour()
      Gets behaviour on mailbox delivery failure.

      Applies to both LDA and LMTP backends.

      Returns:
      Failure behaviour: "retry" or "bounce" (default: "retry").

    • getMaxRetryCount

      public int getMaxRetryCount()
      Gets maximum retry count for outbound relay.

      Applies to both LDA and LMTP backends.

      Returns:
      Maximum retry count (default: 10).

    • isAuthSocketEnabled

      public boolean isAuthSocketEnabled()
      Checks if Dovecot socket authentication backend is enabled.
      Returns:
      True if authSocket.enabled is true, false otherwise.

    • isAuthSqlEnabled

      public boolean isAuthSqlEnabled()
      Checks if Dovecot SQL authentication backend is enabled.
      Returns:
      True if authSql.enabled is true, false otherwise.
